Audi 0-60 times

It feels like you love hitting the gas pedal to the very bottom and put some interest in Audi vehicles. Curious to know what Audi model has the best 0-60 times? For your convenience our team has collected the acceleration data in one place so that you could check out accurate stats on Audi 0-60 times across models and years.

Browse through the variety of Audi models to discover the brand’s vehicles with the best as well as the poorest 0-60 mph performance. You might also want to trace how 0-60 times of a specific Audi model changed across years or compare between different models of the Audi family.

Why is that so important? It is as simple as that. Although official Audi 0-60 times are almost impossible to reach in real world conditions, at least, it is a great indicator of engine’s power. For only 1% of people are interested in this information, you may rightfully be proud of yourself!
